answerText: forkhead box or winged helix[10] While FOXP2 is important in brain development, FOXP3 regulates development of the regulatory type of these immune cells whose other types include helper and cytotoxic cells.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Georgia Tech and Williams | 20 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This transcription factor that regulates expression of CNTNAP2 was found to be mutated in members of the KE family with language disorders. For 10 points each: [10] Name this helix-turn-helix motif. Proteins containing this, and named after this motif, include FOXP2 and FOXO1.
